    • getMetadata

      @GetMapping("/metadata") public String getMetadata​(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Parameters:
      model - represents the thymeleaf model accesible through the view
      Returns:
      the view of all instances of MD_metadata contained into the knowledge base with their associated organization name and title

    • getPostSelectedMd

      @PostMapping("/metadata/selected") public String getPostSelectedMd​(@RequestParam(name="md",required=true) String md, @RequestParam(name="prefixindSon",required=false,defaultValue="nopIndSON") String prefixindSon, @RequestParam(name="indSon",required=false,defaultValue="noIndSON") String indSon, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Parameters:
      md - represents the local name of an instance of MD_Metadata
      indSon - represents the local name of an instance associated to a metadata instance (by an object property or a succession of object property)
      model - represents the thymeleaf model accesible through the view
      Returns:
      the view of the selected metadata

    • getSelectedMd

      @GetMapping("/metadata/selected") public String getSelectedMd​(@RequestParam(name="md",required=true) String md, @RequestParam(name="indSon",required=false,defaultValue="noIndSON") String indSon, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Parameters:
      md - represents the local name of an instance of MD_Metadata
      indSon - represents the local name of an instance associated to a metadata instance (by an object property or a succession of object property)
      model - represents the thymeleaf model accesible through the view
      Returns:
      the view of the selected metadata

    • getMdChangeView

      @GetMapping("/metadata/update") public String getMdChangeView​(@RequestParam(name="md",required=true) String md, @RequestParam(name="ind",required=false,defaultValue="noIndSON") String ind, @RequestParam(name="property",required=true) String property, @RequestParam(name="value",required=true) String value)
      Parameters:
      md - represents the local name of an instance of MD_Metadata
      ind - represents the local name of an instance associated to a metadata instance (by an object property or a succession of object property)
      property - represents the local name of a datatype property associated to "md" or "ind"
      value - represents the value associated to "md" or "ind" by "property"
      Returns:
      stay on the current page
